component.name: PokeMMO
component.summary: Multiplayer Nintendo DS and GBA game emulator

description.p: This is the official flatpak for PokeMMO, a turn-based MMORPG. PokeMMO is an online-only emulator for several popular Nintendo DS & Game Boy Advance games, allowing you to play, talk, fight, and trade with other players in real time. PokeMMO supports Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS, with tens of thousands of players online daily in a cross-play environment
PokeMMO requires certain third-party ROM files to play. Visit https://pokemmo.com/downloads/linux/ for the current list of ROM files compatible with the game

This game requires a constant internet connection. Usage of this program requires an account with https://pokemmo.com/ and requires you to accept the PokeMMO Terms of Service at login. Visit https://pokemmo.com/tos and https://pokemmo.com/privacy for service terms
Updates the PokeMMO Unix Launcher to v3.0d

ul.li: On platforms which support Wayland, Wayland is now enabled
Better backend support for Wayland, automated transitions between X11 & Wayland where available
Improved icons for HiDPI displays for Flatpak distribution

description.p: Updates the PokeMMO Unix Launcher to v3.0a

ul.li: The launcher has been rewritten for Flatpak Wayland compatibility. The game client will automatically enable Wayland when available
Improves feed sharing between Launcher / Client, reducing startup times

description.p: This is the first official release of the PokeMMO flatpak. Previous unofficial versions have been superseded by this package.

ul.li: Game client files are now maintained by the shared Unix Launcher. This wrapper manages downloads and game client updates.
Added "PokeMMO Settings" to the games menu
Fixes being unable to select mod files
Fixes caching issues seen in previous versions
Fixes startup failures seen in previous versions
Wayland support is experimental and partially available.

To enable, open Flatpak Permissions and enable both "X11 windowing system" and "Wayland windowing system" under Advanced Permissions for PokeMMO. Then, select the Wayland compositor under Video Settings after starting PokeMMO.
Steam OS is partially supported. Visit https://support.pokemmo.com/knowledgebase/article/steam-deck-setup for setup information.
